article.headline: Hampton 78, Bethune Cookman 62
article.story: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla. (AP) -- Jaz Cowan scored 23 points to power Hampton past Bethune-Cookman, 78-62, in a Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference game Wednesday night. Cowan hit 10 of his 13 shot attempts as the visiting Pirates (2-7, 1-1) never trailed in halting a three-game losing streak. Junior Pehoua and Jeff Granger contributed 13 points apiece and Bruce Brown added 12 for Hampton, which shot 66.7 percent from the field (30 for 45). Bethune-Cookman (4-8, 1-1), which struggled with a 38.3 shooting percentage (23 for 60), was led by 22 points from Michael Williams, 16 from and Antonio Webb and 10 from Sam Barber. The Wildcats have lost four of their last five. The Wildcats sliced the margin to 42-32 early in the second half, but the Pirates followed Brown's rebounding dominance and Pehoua's outside shooting to surge to a 24-point lead, 58-34, with 10:58 left. Williams did most of the damage inside as the Wildcats cut the difference to nine points, 66-57, with 3:18 to go. But they could get no closer. In the first half, Hampton's lead swelled to 19 points, 38-19, with 4:29 left before intermission, mainly because of Brown's inside work. He hit all five of his shots in the half. Bethune-Cookman used all nine of Webb's first half points on a 9-2 run to cut the margin to 12 points, 40-28, at halftime.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
